title: 1902 Wilmington AA Team Pin with Negro Batboy and Goat Mascot**SOLD**
author: JMANOS

posts.post_title: 1902 Wilmington AA Team Pin with Negro Batboy and Goat Mascot**SOLD**
posts.post_content: $200 Pin only...pin measures 1 1/4 inches in diameter. The original paper backing has been removed, but is similar to a Whitehead & Hoag pin. Some light but otherwise a very strong image.
